00194    class ExportKit
00195    {
00196    public:
00197       Tags filetags; 
00198       wxFileName destfile; 
00199       double t0;           
00200       double t1;           
00201    };  // end of ExportKit declaration
00202    /* we are going to want an set of these kits, and don't know how many until
00203     * runtime. I would dearly like to use a std::vector, but it seems that
00204     * this isn't done anywhere else in Audacity, presumably for a reason?, so
00205     * I'm stuck with wxArrays, which are much harder, as well as non-standard.
00206     */
00207    WX_DECLARE_OBJARRAY(ExportKit, ExportKitArray);
